location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:283 x 170 mm, on sheet 332 x 204 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Reproduced by the Survey of Egypt, January 10th 1917 (663Z).Distinctive Features:Outline map of Yemen showing routes across the region with districts and approximate location of major tribes indicated. Contains a key to symbols at the bottom left-hand corner. Routes numbered for reference and described in detail in the Handbook.Inscriptions:Upper left of the map: ‘ASIR’ inserted in red crayon and a number of place names underlined.
